channel.title: ostv on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in ostv on Barefoot Rob

item.title: tvOS vocab builder
item.description: 15:21 Wednesday 25 November 2015 JST Nearly got my audio manager thing working for the osTV app we’re making, but it’s got a design flaw or two or more. Basically it needs to load data from the web before it knows what words it can play. So I need it to wait for the words… maybe I can make it a singleton to simplify things. hmm
